remixlab.bias.core

Class BogusEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.core.BogusEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClickEvent, KeyboardEvent, MotionEvent

    public class BogusEvent
extends Object
implements Copyable
    The root event class of all events that are to be handled by an Agent. Every BogusEvent encapsulates a Shortcut which may be bound to an user-defined Action (see shortcut()).

    The following are the main class specializations: MotionEvent, ClickEvent, and KeyboardEvent. Please refer to their documentation for details.

    Note BogusEvent detection/reduction could happened in several different ways. For instance, in the context of Java-based application, it typically takes place when implementing a mouse listener interface. In Processing, it does it when registering at the PApplet the so called mouseEvent method. Moreover, the Agent.feed() provides a callback alternative when none of these mechanisms are available (as it often happens when dealing with specialized, non-default input hardware).
